statements: DELETE FROM PrintMediaMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_due_date < '2022-12-31' AND printer_model = 'XYZ Printer';
DELETE FROM PrintMediaMaintenanceSchedule WHERE publication_id = 100 AND maintenance_due_date < '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM PrintMediaMaintenanceSchedule WHERE last_serviced_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM printing_technology WHERE id = 10 AND manufacturer = 'Epson';
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe' AND last_service_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Print_Publications WHERE publication_type = 'Magazine' AND publication_frequency < 12;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE technician = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine' AND servicing_date < '2021-06-01';
